basicsItems: Pick one task and write the next tiny step.
Work for 25 minutes with zero distractions.
Take a 5 minute break (stand up, water, stretch).
After 4 work sessions, take a longer break (15‚Äì30 minutes).
During focus time, defer interruptions: jot them down and return later.
appItems: Press Start to begin; use Pause/Resume anytime.
Use Skip to move to the next phase if needed (e.g. emergency break).
Open Settings (‚öôÔ∏è) to tune durations and auto-start behavior.
Use the Work/Short Break/Long Break buttons to choose a phase (disabled while running).

Keep breaks restorative: avoid scrolling and email.
